title: Referral bonus for successful recommendations
content: When you refer a client to Onix, and they make their first payment, we express our gratitude by offering you a 10% referral bonus. This bonus is calculated based on the initial payment received from the referred client.

title: Program duration.
content: Our referral program lasts 12 months, beginning when Onix receives the first payment from the referred client.

title: Prompt disbursement.
content: Rest assured, your referral bonus will be disbursed promptly after we receive payment from the referred client.

title: Mutual collaboration
content: Our referral program goes beyond financial rewards. It's a gateway to mutual collaboration. By recommending our services, you not only earn rewards but also enhance your professional reputation.

title: Leverage our expertise.
content: If you have an in-house team but need more experience in a specific technology, refer leads in that area to us. We'll handle the technical aspects while you focus on delivering value to your clients.

title: Mutual benefits.
content: In return, we reciprocate by providing expertise in areas where we excel, but you might be in need. It is a win-win situation where both parties benefit.
